query:
SELECT 
  e.id as evento_id,
  e.turmaId,
  t.codigo as turma_codigo,
  te.nome as tipo_evento,
  COUNT(DISTINCT bg.id) as total_grupos,
  COUNT(DISTINCT bf.id) as total_formandos
FROM eventos e
INNER JOIN turmas t ON t.id = e.turmaId
INNER JOIN tipos_evento te ON te.id = e.tipoEventoId
LEFT JOIN briefing_grupo bg ON bg.eventoId = e.id
LEFT JOIN briefing_formando bf ON bf.eventoId = e.id
WHERE t.codigo = '654'
GROUP BY e.id, e.turmaId, t.codigo, te.nome
ORDER BY e.id;
